snippet: Concerns about iron deficiency have eased with the wide availability of iron-fortified foods and drinks. Now more attention is being paid to the opposite problem: iron overload, which can cause serious problems, particularly in older people.
abstract: Concerns about iron deficiency have eased with the wide availability of iron-fortified foods and drinks. Now more attention is being paid to the opposite problem: iron overload, which can cause serious problems, particularly in older people.

headline.main: A Host of Ills When Iron's Out of Balance
headline.print_headline: Personal Health: A Host of Ills When Iron’s Out of Balance
